subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Vernon Wells drove in the go-ahead run in the 10th with a ground-rule double after Travis Hafner tied the game in the ninth with a home run, as the Yankees won despite a spotty outing by C. C. Sabathia.
snippet: Vernon Wells drove in the go-ahead run in the 10th with a ground-rule double after Travis Hafner tied the game in the ninth with a home run, as the Yankees won despite a spotty outing by C. C. Sabathia.
